__e: No no it's not the first time ! We've seen you enough !
And I asked him why. He said, "I know you're tired of eating this food in here."
Look, friend, I ain't sure you wanna be around here... and I'm damn sure we're getting tired of having you. That plain enough?
We were the most tired people on the face of the Earth, and all I could think of was, what am I doing wrong?
I think we're both completely exhausted and I think we're both in need of some sleep and I think we should just forget tonight ever happened.
And right now, I finish my work... you get back from your work, we're both tired and cranky, and...
First of all, let me say I appreciate how tired you all are.
Someone who comes this late doesn't care how tired we are.
- Oh, you're sweet to offer... but we're all just so tired... we just wanna get to our new house and rest in peace.
